history.proof: intros t s_le_t t_sup_closed. apply subp_refl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable t (possible names are: T, p2, p1 and p3).
In environment T : lattice s : Pred T t : Pred_Class s_le_t : s <=p t t_sup_closed : sup_closed t x : T i : x \\In ?M1464 Unable to unify "x \\In sup_closure ?M1464" with "x \\In t".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
s: Pred T

Goal:
forall t : Pred_Class, s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t

Premises:
Notation Pred_Class := (Pred_Sort (PredPredType _))
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
sup_closure = fun (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) => [Pred p | forall t : Pred T, s <=p t -> t \In sup_closed -> p \In t] : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments sup_closure {T}
Notation lattice := Lattice.type
sup_clos_sub : forall s : Pred T, s <=p sup_closure s
Lattice.sort = fun t : lattice => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : lattice -> Type Lattice.sort is a coercion
Poset.sort = fun t : poset => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : poset -> Type Poset.sort is a coercion
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- Type] ?T' : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- Type] ?f : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- ?T'] ?s : [T : lattice s : Pred T |- seq ?T]
subp_trans : forall (T : Type) (p2 p1 p3 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p3 -> p1 <=p p3
subp_asym : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> p2 <=p p1 -> p1 =p p2
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
subp_orr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU q p1 <=p PredU q p2
subp_orl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU p1 q <=p PredU p2 q
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Image_inj_sub : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (X1 X2 : Pred A), injective f -> [Image f i | i <- X1] <=p [Image f i | i <- X2] -> X1 <=p X2
subp_or : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p q /\ p2 <=p q < -> PredU p1 p2 <=p q
sup_mono : forall s1 s2 : Pred T, s1 <=p s2 -> sup s1 <== sup s2
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
subp_and : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), q <=p p1 /\ q <=p p2 < -> q <=p (fun x : T => p1 x /\ p2 x)
subp_andr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => q x /\ p1 x) <=p (fun x : T => q x /\ p2 x)
subp_andl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => p1 x /\ q x) <=p (fun x : T => p2 x /\ q x)
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
subp_refl : forall (T : Type) (p : Pred T), p <=p p
Lattice.Pack : forall sort : Type, Lattice.class_of sort -> Type -> lattice
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
predI_morph : forall (T : Type) (x y : Pred_Class), x <~> y -> forall x0 y0 : Pred_Class, x0 <~> y0 -> PredI x x0 <~> PredI y y0
predU_morph : forall (T : Type) (x y : Pred_Class), x <~> y -> forall x0 y0 : Pred_Class, x0 <~> y0 -> EqSimplPred (PredU x x0) (PredU y y0)
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
Lattice.sup = fun cT : lattice => [eta Lattice.mx_sup (Lattice.mixin (Lattice.class cT))] : forall cT : lattice, Pred cT -> cT Arguments Lattice.sup {cT}
Lattice.clone : forall (T : Type) (cT : lattice) (c : Lattice.class_of T), phant_id (Lattice.class cT) c -> lattice
Lattice.poset = fun cT : lattice => Poset.Pack (Lattice.class cT) cT : lattice -> poset Lattice.poset is a coercion
Image' : forall A B : Type, Pred A -> (A -> B) -> Pred B
Lattice.pack : forall (T : Type) (b0 : Poset.class_of T) (m0 m : Lattice.mixin_of (Poset.Pack b0 T)), phant_id m0 m -> lattice
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
fun_of_Pred : forall T : Type, Pred T -> T -> Prop
Lattice.mx_sup : forall T : poset, Lattice.mixin_of T -> Pred T -> T
inf : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> T
subPoset : forall T : poset, Pred T -> poset
MemProp : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Mem_Pred T
Pred_of_Simpl : forall T : Type, Simpl_Pred T -> Pred T

``` 
intros t s_le_t t_sup_closed.
apply subp_trans with (t := t_sup_closed).
+ apply sup_clos_sub.
+ apply subp_refl.
```
